H0.text: who is the woman that john edwards had an affair with. Elizabeth Edwards

H1.text: who is the woman that john edwards had an affair with. Jennifer Palmieri

H2.text: who is the woman that john edwards had an affair with. Andrea Metcalf

H3.text: who is the woman that john edwards had an affair with. Rielle Hunter

A4.text: John Edwards admitted to an extended affair with Rielle Hunter

A5.text: Elizabeth Edwards released a statement criticizing claims that her husband fathered a child as an 'absurd lie in a tabloid publication'

A6.text: In October 2007, The National Enquirer began a series of reports alleging an adulterous affair between Edwards and former campaign worker Rielle Hunter.

A7.text: In 2012, Rielle Hunter announced her breakup with Edwards the same day she released a book about their relationship.
